title: 2006 Royale XLII Double Slide
description:
VIN:Â  2PCW3349151028610 2006 Prevost Royale XLII Double Slide Just Arrived On Consignment From A Former Customer Of Ours. A Royale Of This Vintage Represents Simplicity And Solid Functionality In A Budget-Friendly Package. We Find That Higher-Mileage Coaches Owned By Equipment Operators Are Generally Well-Maintained On The Chassis Side And Run Well. That Is Exactly The Case With This Coach, Coming From Trucking Company Owners. Full Engine Service In 2024 With The Overhead Run (Valves Adjusted) And New Turbo Installed. This Bus Is A Solid Runner With Normal Wear And Tear.
